mapper.insert: insert into NIMA_NOTICE_INFO (ID, TITLE, CREATE_TIME, USER_ID, DEL_FLAG, CONTENT) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{content,jdbcType=CLOB})

mapper.update:
update NIMA_NOTICE_INFO
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=CLOB},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update NIMA_NOTICE_INFO set TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=CLOB} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
SELECT ,
FROM NIMA_NOTICE_INFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND DEL_FLAG = 0
AND TITLE LIKE concat(concat('%',#{noticeInfo.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND CONTENT LIKE concat(concat('%',#{noticeInfo.content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC
